required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of The Performance of Monthly Replacement Sphere Lens Deigns in Habitual Soft Contact Lens Wearers
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of The Performance of Monthly Replacement Sphere Lens Deigns in Habitual Soft Contact Lens Wearers

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to evaluate the clinical performance of two monthly silicone hydrogel contact lenses in habitual wearers of frequent replacement (FRP) lenses when worn for 1-month.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a prospective, bilateral eye, double-masked, randomized, 1-month cross-over, daily-wear design involving two different FRP lens types. Each lens type will be worn for approximately one month.

primary_outcome.measure: Subjective Ratings on Lens handling on removal
primary_outcome.description: Subjective Ratings on Lens handling on removal (0-10 scale, 0.5 steps; 0- very easy, 10 -very difficult)

arm_group.description: Subjects will be randomized to wear test lenses for one month.
Subjects will be randomized to wear control lenses for one month.
